name: TheAtlantic
text: "When they say the 2020 election was stolen, Trumpists are expressing their view that the votes of rival constituencies should not count, even though they understand, on some level, that they do," @AdamSerwer writes: https://t.co/MHt0wl0U7k

name: TheAtlantic
text: 1.4 million new cases; 106,000 hospitalizations; 15,966 deaths. Even in a horrible year, this week stands out, writes @COVID19tracking. https://t.co/vrtVDtiEFX

name: TheAtlantic
text: An FDA advisory committee has voted to authorize the first COVID-19 vaccine in the U.S. It should be administered to the first Americans in the coming days, @jameshamblin reports. https://t.co/4mv1eGUFxK

name: TheAtlantic
text: An FDA advisory committee has voted to authorize the first COVID-19 vaccine in the U.S. It should be administered to the first Americans the in coming days, @jameshamblin reports. https://t.co/7WGeO2n8Qa

name: TheAtlantic
text: “This bizarre need to feel busy, or to feel that time is structured, even when one is sprawled on the couch on a weekend afternoon—where does it come from?” @DKThomp asks. “Is it inscribed in our DNA,” or a product of industrialized culture? https://t.co/V02UF8sD2Z

name: TheAtlantic
text: COVID-19 has changed science forever, preparing scientists to face future pandemics and revealing the field’s frailties, @edyong209 writes. https://t.co/os0mFvH9ij

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @Saahil_Desai: truly incredible @kait_tiffany lede https://t.co/QtopryDiIW https://t.co/zXPttDUe02

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @AdrienneLaF: "What mystifies me is Epstein’s desire to police the use of the title, when he could instead just use it as requested, like a normal person, and contain his disrespect." @gcaw on that WSJ piece:   https://t.co/BjdnPtsJtY

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @sarahzhang: "At its best, science is a self-correcting march toward greater knowledge for the betterment of humanity. At its worst, it is a self-interested pursuit of greater prestige at the cost of truth & rigor."

As @edyong209 writes, COVID-19 intensified both. 

https://t.co/syGAXWgUvR

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @TheAtlPhoto: Virginia: Images of the Old Dominion - the 49th in a year-long photo series, focusing on each of the 50 states in the United States of America. https://t.co/xp5J5W2cnl https://t.co/pvMz83q9dp

name: TheAtlantic
text:

name: TheAtlantic
text:
Today the Electoral College will cast its official votes for president.

The institution has been a point of controversy for years. Abolishing it may be impossible, but in future years there could be a way around it, @russellberman reports: https://t.co/1qZgUSX2XX

name: TheAtlantic

text: "If Jill Biden wants to flaunt her Ed.D., who is Joseph Epstein to object?" asks @gcaw: https://t.co/wyc6Pr2bsQ
